description: Triangle read by rows: row n (n>=1) contains the numbers T(n,k) = sum_{d|n} phi(d)*k^(n/d)/n, for k=1..n.
links: Index entries for sequences related to necklaces
maple: A054631 := proc(n,k) add( numtheory[phi](d)*k^(n/d),d=numtheory[divisors](n) ) ;  %/n ; end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Aug 30 2011
mathematica: Needs["Combinatorica`"]; Table[Table[NumberOfNecklaces[n, k, Cyclic], {k, 1, n}], {n, 1, 8}] //Grid (* after code by T.D. Noe in A027671, _Geoffrey Critzer_, Oct 07 2012 *)t[n_, k_] := Sum[EulerPhi[d]*k^(n/d)/n, {d, Divisors[n]}]; Table[t[n, k], {n, 1, 9}, {k, 1, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Jan 20 2014 *)
crossrefs: Cf. A054630, A054618, A054619. Lower triangle of A075195.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 16 2000, revised Mar 21 2007
